metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42860 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** A stack buffer overflow exists in Mini-XML v3.2. When inputting an unformed XML string to the mxmlLoadString API, it will cause a stack-buffer-overflow in mxml_string_getc:2611. NOTE: it is unclear whether this input is allowed by the API specification.

criterions.comment: mxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
